syntax.unclosed_block: You opened a block with '[' but never closed it. Add a ']' at the end.
syntax.missing_semicolon_eof: It looks like you might have forgotten a semicolon (;) at the end of the previous line.
syntax.unexpected_eof: Unexpected end of file. You likely opened a block with '[' but never closed it.
syntax.missing_semicolon: It looks like you might have forgotten a semicolon (;) before "{{tokenText}}".
syntax.unknown_command: I don't understand "{{tokenText}}". Is it a typo? Please check the spelling.
syntax.unexpected_token: I wasn't expecting "{{tokenText}}" here. Did you add an extra word or number?
syntax.expected_number: I expected a number here, but found "{{tokenText}}".
